title: Feluda Mysteries
description: Dive into the thrilling adventures of Feluda, the iconic detective created by Satyajit Ray. Follow Feluda and his companions as they solve mysterious cases and uncover hidden truths.

title: Professor Shonku’s Inventions
description: Innovative creations and scientific marvels by Professor Shonku, a brilliant scientist with a curious mind and a passion for exploration.

title: Short Stories Collection
description: Experience a collection of captivating short stories that showcase Satyajit Ray's narrative prowess and stylistic finesse. Each story is a journey into the depths of human emotions and experiences.

title: Screenplays & Scripts Showcase
description: Discover the art of visual storytelling through Satyajit Ray's screenplays and scripts. Explore the cinematic mind behind his acclaimed films, featuring compelling narratives and unforgettable characters.

title: Essays & Reflections
description: Delve into Satyajit Ray's insightful essays and reflections on cinema, culture, and society. Gain a deeper understanding of the legendary filmmaker’s thoughts and perspectives on a wide range of topics.

title: Legacy of Satyajit Ray
description: Celebrate the timeless legacy of Satyajit Ray through a curated collection of his most iconic works. Explore the influence of his genius on modern cinema and witness the ways in which his creativity continues to inspire and resonate worldwide.
